sentences.sContent: In the sequent ten years, he travelled almost the whole country.
sentences.sContent_eng: In the sequent ten years, he travelled almost the whole country.
sentences.sCn: 在接下来的十年里他差不多走遍了整个国家。

sentences.sContent: As one of the critical steps, identification of risk factors affects the sequent risk evaluation directly.
sentences.sContent_eng: As one of the critical steps, identification of risk factors affects the sequent risk evaluation directly.
sentences.sCn: 摘要风险因素辨识作为风险评价的关键环节之一， 其结果直接影响后续的风险评价。

synos.tran: 连续的；其次的；作为结果而产生的

words.tran: 连续的；相继的；有顺序的
[数][计] 序列；顺序；续发事件
